description:
A GET request to the OS API should return a numerical flavorID. It currently returns a string name. Example:

flavorId="m1.tiny"
title: OSAPI: GET /server/<id> returns invalid flavor ID

comments.content:
A GET request to the OS API should return a numerical flavorID. It currently returns a string name. Example:

flavorId="m1.tiny"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
